# Groq

Use `groq/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "groq-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "groq/llama-3.1-8b-instant",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `GROQ_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/groq`

## Default base URL

Not listed.

You can override the base URL by setting `GROQ_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://console.groq.com/docs/models
